name: hauntedmansion
description:
If you don't have love2D

  • LD41_hauntedmansion.zip contains the windows executable and love2D dll files. Download this one and extract the contents.

If you do have love2D

  • Use the hauntedmansion.love
  • The source code is in hauntedmansion.zip and you can also run it from there
